name: 3davatar
description: 3D Avatar with AI Chat - Interactive 3D room with AI-powered avatar for text and voice conversations

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd apps/frontend && npm run test:watch" "cd apps/backend && npm run test:watch"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint:fix: cd apps/frontend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../backend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.type-check: cd apps/frontend && npm run type-check && cd ../backend && npm run type-check
scripts.format: cd apps/frontend && npm run format && cd ../backend && npm run format
